arguments.value: Node Supervisor is used to restart programs when they crash.
arguments.raw: "Node Supervisor is used to restart programs when they crash."

arguments.value: It can also be used to restart programs when a *.js file changes.
arguments.raw: "It can also be used to restart programs when a *.js file changes."

arguments.value: A comma-delimited list of folders or js files to watch for changes.
arguments.raw: "    A comma-delimited list of folders or js files to watch for changes."

arguments.value: When a change to a js file occurs, reload the program
arguments.raw: "    When a change to a js file occurs, reload the program"

arguments.value: A comma-delimited list of folders to ignore for changes.
arguments.raw: "    A comma-delimited list of folders to ignore for changes."

arguments.value: Enable symbolic links ignoring when looking for files to watch.
arguments.raw: "    Enable symbolic links ignoring when looking for files to watch."

arguments.value: How often to poll watched files for changes.
arguments.raw: "    How often to poll watched files for changes."

arguments.value: Specific file extensions to watch in addition to defaults.
arguments.raw: "    Specific file extensions to watch in addition to defaults."

arguments.value: The executable that runs the specified program.
arguments.raw: "    The executable that runs the specified program."

arguments.value: Don't automatically restart the supervised program if it ends.
arguments.raw: "    Don't automatically restart the supervised program if it ends."

arguments.value: Supervisor will wait for a change in the source files.
arguments.raw: "    Supervisor will wait for a change in the source files."

arguments.value: If "error", an exit code of 0 will still restart.
arguments.raw: "    If \"error\", an exit code of 0 will still restart."

arguments.value: If "exit", no restart regardless of exit code.
arguments.raw: "    If \"exit\", no restart regardless of exit code."

arguments.value: If "success", no restart only if exit code is 0.
arguments.raw: "    If \"success\", no restart only if exit code is 0."

arguments.value: With this option, supervisor won't listen to stdin.
arguments.raw: "    With this option, supervisor won't listen to stdin."

arguments.value: use SIGKILL (-9) to terminate child instead of the more gentle SIGTERM.
arguments.raw: "    use SIGKILL (-9) to terminate child instead of the more gentle SIGTERM."

arguments.value: This may be useful if you see a high cpu load on a windows machine.
arguments.raw: "    This may be useful if you see a high cpu load on a windows machine."

arguments.value: Make it easy to tell when the task last ran.
arguments.raw: "    Make it easy to tell when the task last ran."

arguments.value: Useful for restarting supervisor eaven if no file has changed.
arguments.raw: "     Useful for restarting supervisor eaven if no file has changed."
